content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great investment. What price were you considering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 500 Euro per month is a reasonable price. It's in the city center and close to all important facilities.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept that price. It's much lower than the market value for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm looking for a price closer to 800 Euro per month. What do you think about that?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price is too high.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your concern. However, I'm confident that the location and amenities of my apartment justify the higher price. If you're not willing to consider 800 Euro per month, then perhaps we should terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euro per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's still not acceptable to me. The apartment is brand new and in a prime location. I believe 800 Euro per month is a fair price for such a property. If you're not willing to meet my asking price, I think we should terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euro per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I must stand firm on my asking price of 800 Euro per month. This apartment is a rare find in the city center, and I'm confident that its value is reflected in the price. If you're not willing to pay 800 Euro per month, then I think we should terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [780] Euro per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but my final offer is 800 Euro per month. This is the price I believe reflects the quality and location of the apartment. If you're not willing to pay 800 Euro per month, then I think we should terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
